mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM client WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM client WHERE ip_address = #{value}
SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION BY user_id ORDER BY check_time DESC) AS r0 FROM client WHERE user_id = #{value} AND r0 = 1
SELECT * FROM client_history WHERE user_id = #{value} ORDER BY check_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO client (user_id, ip_address, mac_address, os, pc_protector_version, pc_name, check_time, roles) VALUES (#{userId}, #{ipAddress}, #{macAddress}, #{os}, #{pcProtectorVersion}, #{pcName}, #{checkTime}, 'CLIENT');

INSERT INTO client_history (user_id, ip_address, mac_address, os, pc_protector_version, pc_name, check_time, roles) VALUES (#{userId}, #{ipAddress}, #{macAddress}, #{os}, #{pcProtectorVersion}, #{pcName}, #{checkTime}, 'CLIENT');
mapper.update: UPDATE client SET os = #{os}, ip_address = #{ipAddress}, mac_address = #{macAddress}, pc_name = #{pcName}, pc_protector_version = #{pcProtectorVersion}, update_time = now() WHERE user_id = #{userId};

UPDATE client_history SET os = #{os}, ip_address = #{ipAddress}, mac_address = #{macAddress}, pc_name = #{pcName}, pc_protector_version = #{pcProtectorVersion}, check_time = now() WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY check_time DESC LIMIT 1
UPDATE client SET wrong_md5 = true, pc_protector_version = #{pcProtectorVersion}, update_time = now() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM client WHERE mac_address = #{macAddress} OR user_id = #{userId}
